hero.title: Arzaq Alkhair for Food Industries
hero.subtitle: Délice - Quality, Purity, and Unforgettable Taste
hero.description: Established in late 2017, we provide the finest dairy products using the most advanced production lines in North Africa.

home.products_desc: Natural, Strained, and Fruit-flavored yogurt drinks and cups.
home.factory_desc: One of the largest production lines in North Africa, ensuring the highest standards of food safety.
home.cta_desc: We are here to answer all your inquiries. Contact us now.

about.title: About Us
about.intro_desc: Arzaq Alkhair for Food Industries (Brand: Délice) is a leading Libyan company established in late 2017 in the Industrial Zone, Zliten. Spanning 14 hectares with 7 hectares of covered production space, we are committed to excellence in food safety and quality.
about.mission_desc: To deliver fresh, healthy, and high-quality dairy products developed through R&D to meet consumer needs, ensuring a sustainable future in the Libyan market.
about.vision_desc: To maintain a competitive advantage through quality control and modern technology, complying with Libyan and international food safety standards.
about.partners_desc: Marketing is conducted through 'Nabd Al-Souq' for Marketing and Distribution, utilizing direct sales and a network of authorized agents across all Libya.

products_page.title: Our Products
products_page.subtitle: High-quality dairy products under the Délice brand

p1.name: Yogurt Drink – Strawberry & Cranberry
p1.description: A pure and refreshing yogurt drink made with the latest technology, flavored with delicious strawberry and cranberry.

p2.name: Yogurt Cup – Forest Fruits
p2.description: Creamy natural yogurt produced on our advanced production line with a forest fruits flavor.

p3.name: Yogurt Cup – Plain
p3.description: A delicious plain yogurt cup, developed by our research and development team.

p4.name: Yogurt Drink – Strawberry & Banana
p4.description: A delicious and healthy yogurt drink with strawberry and banana flavor.

p5.name: Yogurt Cup – Biscuit & Strawberry
p5.description: A fresh yogurt cup with biscuit and strawberry flavor, a consumer favorite.

p6.name: Yogurt Cup – Vanilla
p6.description: Delicious yogurt with a smooth vanilla flavor.

p7.name: Yogurt Drink – Sour Milk
p7.description: A smooth, mildly sweet yogurt drink that is healthy and delicious.

p8.name: Yogurt Drink – Vanilla
p8.description: A rich vanilla-flavored yogurt drink for a unique taste.

p9.name: Yogurt Drink – Almond
p9.description: A delicious yogurt drink with almond flavor.

p10.name: Yogurt Drink – Kiwi & Chia
p10.description: A refreshing blend of kiwi and chia seeds in a creamy drink.

p11.name: Yogurt Drink – Pistachio
p11.description: A rich pistachio-flavored yogurt drink for a distinctive taste.

p12.name: Yogurt Drink – Strawberry
p12.description: An explosion of strawberry flavor in every sip.

p13.name: Yogurt Drink – Kiwi & Banana
p13.description: Kiwi blended with tropical banana for a refreshing experience.

factory_page.title: Our Factory
factory_page.subtitle: Industrial Zone, Zliten - One of the largest facilities in North Africa

overview.title: Modern Production Unit
overview.desc: Spanning 14 hectares, our facility includes a dedicated production unit and fully equipped residential staff units. We use the latest specialized machinery for yogurt production.

standards.title: Advanced Technology
standards.tech_desc: Operations starting Dec 2025 with capacity up to 42,000 cups/hr.
standards.lab_desc: Managed by Tunisian and Libyan experts following international specs.

distribution.title: Nabd Al-Souq Distribution
distribution.desc: A dedicated distribution arm ensuring our products reach all regions across Libya through authorized agents.
